m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors Inc. Faces Adversity, and GE Has Huge Potential In 3-D Printing -- The Motley Fool
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Motors Inc. Faces Adversity, and GE Has Huge Potential In 3-D Printing Will the loss of California's $2,500 electric vehicle rebate hinder sales of Tesla Motors Inc.'s Model S? Daniel Miller ( TMFTwoCoins ) Apr 4, 2014 at 3:00PM The Dow Jones Industrial Average ( DJINDICES:^DJI ) was trading 155 points lower, or 0.94%, at 3 p.m. EDT despite the U.S. economy adding 192,000 jobs in March, which just a bit below expectations.
